医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究确定了视网膜细胞瘤功能突变的潜在增益一份新的研究论文在2025年1月20日在基因和癌症第16卷中发表，题为“对视网膜母细胞瘤的致病变异分析揭示了功能突变的潜在增益。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-istifies-potential-gain-gain-function-moint-moint-in-retinoblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-indistifies-potential-gain-gain-function-moint-moint-in-rotinoblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e843816a-034E-4758-4758-ADA7-ADA7-ADA7-3228F0C715FD Wed, 29 Jan 2025 12:58:16 -0500 Study identifies potential gain of function mutation in retinoblastoma
基于家庭的基于家庭的治疗对儿童肥胖有效基于家庭的行为治疗（FBT）是一种治疗肥胖儿童的临床经验方法，其中医疗保健专业人员与家人一起工作，通过促进体育锻炼，鼓励健康的饮食习惯和教学年龄适当的行为来帮助儿童减肥技能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/self-guided-family-family--wareatment-wareatment-treatment-forcective-for-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/self-guided-family--family-qual--wareatment-warteatment-forcective-for-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81cc052a-93b9-4813-4813-81bd-420372e54f7f Wed, 29 Jan 2025 12:49:05 -0500 Self-guided family-based treatment effective for childhood obesity
青少年使用避孕套的信心和沟通密钥一项新的荟萃分析，评估了249项研究中的避孕套的使用，而超过2500万的美国青少年发现，仅了解更安全的性实践就不足以鼓励使用避孕套。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/confidence-and-communication-communication-communication-communication-communication-to-condom-use-use-us-as-among-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/confidence-and-communication-communication-key-to-condom-use-use-ash-mong-among-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=588689fc-e8f5-4742-98c9-bfc6b96b96cd53c Wed, 29 Jan 2025 12:34:36 -0500 Confidence and communication key to condom use among teens
与较低的剖腹产率有关的足够护士人员配备根据《护理外观》杂志上发表的新研究，由护士足够人员配备的劳动力和分娩单位的出生率较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/adequate-nurse-nurse-staffing-to-to-lown-to-lower-c-section-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/adequate-nurse-nurse-staffing-to-to-to-lower-to-lower-c-section-cection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df99758b-8986-40dc-abd0-7bc13ce56f02 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 12:25:22 -0500 Adequate nurse staffing linked to lower C-section rates
新的AI工具通过预测T细胞表位来更快地开发疫苗Ragon Institute和MIT的Jameel诊所之间的一项令人兴奋的合作在利用人工智能（AI）方面取得了一个重要的里程碑，以帮助开发T细胞疫苗候选物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-ai-tool-promises-faster-vaster-vaccine-development-by previcting-t-t-t-cell-epitopes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-ai-tool-promises-faster-vaster-vaccine-development-by-predicting-t-cell-epitopes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56B745E5-CDD1-416D-9CEF-9CEF-67B34DCD34FF Wed, 29 Jan 2025 12:06:47 -0500 New AI tool promises faster vaccine development by predicting T cell epitopes
研究人员提出了针对炎症性疾病的个性化益生菌疗法萨里大学的研究人员提出了一种通过个性化益生菌疗法（也称为精密医学）来治疗炎症性疾病的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/researchers-propose-persyalized-probiotic-therapies-for-forpor-formin-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/researchers-propose-persyalized-probiotic-therapies-forbor-therapies-for-rampormation-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=052214E7-E617-4157-8E36-BF035D1DBAE3 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 11:59:32 -0500 Researchers propose personalized probiotic therapies for inflammatory diseases
推出的新工具以跟踪传染病通过废水传播欧盟委员会刚刚推出了一种新工具，该工具通过分析废水：欧洲废水监视仪表板来支持传染病的传播。它通过将现有的基于国家和研究的仪表板汇总在一起来显示来自欧盟各地的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-tool-launched-to-track-inctipious-infectious-disease-spread-through-wastewater.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-tool-launched-to-track-inctectious-infectious-disease-disease-spread-through-wastewater.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A10CFE9F-1027-4DDD-8956-EDA29F940F3B Wed, 29 Jan 2025 11:34:11 -0500 New tool launched to track infectious disease spread through wastewater
新的化合物Z526在临床前模型中打击癌症相关的恶病质在最近的一项研究中，研究人员表明，Z526是一种新型的二硫代氨基甲酸酯样化合物，可在体外和体内减轻与癌症相关的卡希克西（CAC）（CAC）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-compound-z526-combats-combats-cancer-saper-cancer-saperciated-cachexia-cachexia-in-in-cachexia-in-in-treclinical-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-compound-z526-combats-combats-cancer-saperciated-cachexia-cachexia-in-cachexia-in-cachexia-in-in-preclinical-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dc81E7777-A53E-4173-B2BA-F90A6F50B6AC Wed, 29 Jan 2025 11:21:35 -0500 New compound Z526 combats cancer-associated cachexia in preclinical models
研究表明，天气因素会影响沙门氏菌的传播根据萨里大学的新研究，气候变化正在影响沙门氏菌的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-shows-weather-factors-factors-affect-salmenella-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-shows-weather-factors-factors-affect-salmenella-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86169c53-e03f-486a-b699-ae52f8b43fb9 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 09:16:55 -0500 Study shows weather factors affect Salmonella transmission
探索癌症细胞死亡与细胞衰老之间的相互作用衰老细胞分泌已知可以促进癌细胞生长的物质。可以选择性地杀死这些细胞或抑制物质分泌的药物的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/exploring-the-interaction-the--intaraction-cell-death-death-and-cellular-senescence-r-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/exploring-the-interaction-between-cell-death-death-and-cellular-senescence-rin-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=383ee25d-f72b-43f3-b6f3-b6f5-556f856f85333b1df Wed, 29 Jan 2025 09:13:19 -0500 Exploring the interaction between cell death and cellular senescence in cancer
